name: typical
author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
description: Functional, isomorphic, load-anywhere type checking for Javascript

scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:esm
scripts.test:all: npm run test:js && npm run test:esm && npm run test:web
scripts.test:js: rollup test/*.mjs -f cjs -d tmp/test && test-runner tmp/test/test*.js
scripts.test:v8: rollup test/test.mjs test/test-default.mjs -f cjs -d tmp/test && test-runner tmp/test/test*.js
scripts.dist: rollup index.mjs -f umd -n typical -o dist/index.js --exports named
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -c jsdoc.conf -t README.hbs index.mjs > README.md; echo
scripts.cover: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
